name: My 2Euros Lite
description: My 2Euros is an Android application to manage your 2 commemorative coin collection from your mobile phone.  My 2Euros offer you the possibility of manage your 2 commemorative coin collection taking into consideration the different uro countries with their different mints. In addition, a quick view is included to see an Euro coins resume for a country of your Euro collector.  A 2 commemorative coin search window is included to facilitate.  Furthermore, a complete database of the 2 commemorative coin information is available inside this application, including the mintage.  The application also includes (Pro version): - Functionality to include the conservation state, the cost and the number of collected coins.  - A Global Statistic window. - A simple backup management functionality. - Export Excel  Available in English, German, Spanish, Italian and French.
